attributes.action: Ban the Premier League from charging £14.95 to watch a game on pay per view
attributes.additional_details: Football fans already spend a lot of money on Sky Sports and BT Sport to watch their teams. Adding this additional cost during a pandemic when many are struggling and worrying about their jobs is disgraceful.
attributes.background: The Premier League is planning to screen games on Sky Box Office at £14.95 per game on a pay per view basis. This cost is outrageous given that many fans are already struggling financially and will be unable to afford to watch the teams they support. Please force the Premier League to make a U-turn.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the footballing authorities.
